name: You Can'T Parkour
description:
*click on screen to enable music*

This is a project submission for ScoreSpace Jam #19

A parkour game where the player has to find the best possible route to be the quickest among others. The player has limited vision and has to be beware of the wind , fire and other obstacles.

The map has 2 regions - Windy and Firey. Windy region slows the player. Firey region has fire pits which damage the player. Is there a path connecting them ?Hmmmm...

The game has inbuilt LeaderBoard thanks to lootlocker.

CONTROLS:

1. ARROW KEYS / WASD to move left, right , jump and slide

2. W/ UP ARROW twice for double jump.

 AIM:

1. Try to avoid the obstacles and reach the end. There are multiple ways to reach the end . Look at the map in left corner. Find the best possible route

2. Pipes and obstacles cause less damage. Fire causes more damage. A health bar is the right corner

3. You will have limited light in the main level.

PS: The 1st level is a training level to get the player to know about the game and controls. This level is a bit glitchy (sorry for that)

GOOD LUCK

Credits:

Music - https://www.free-stock-music.com/parkour-introvert.html
